oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A convenient synthesis of alkyl substituted p-benzoquinones from phenols and H2O2 over TiAPO-5 molecular sieve catalyst
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAHALINGAM, RJ
SELVAM, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Titanium substituted aluminophosphate (TiAPO-5) molecular sieves catalyze the oxidation reaction of alkyl substituted phenols with aqueous H2O2 in acidic medium to give the corresponding p-benzoquinones, in a single step, in high yield.
